channel.title: Database on opennotes
channel.description: Recent content in Database on opennotes

item.title: Consistent Ring Within a Consistent Ring
item.description: Exploring OrangeDB’s hybrid replication model combining Cassandra’s leaderless design and MongoDB’s sharded architecture.

item.title: Introducing OrangeDB: A Distributed Key-Doc Database
item.description: OrangeDB is a key-document distributed database built on top of Parrot, an LSM-based storage engine. Learn how OrangeDB combines ideas from MongoDB and Cassandra for a powerful new system.
